column4: hi all on ubuntu 10.10 firefox wants to save the pdfs I click on. But I want to open them with evince. Can't find any pdf options in Preferences, either, and the only two options I get when clicking a pdf is "Cancel" or "Save". Suggestions?
goltoof, funny thing is, on my other ubuntu machine (10.4 though) it opens without mozplugger installed.
no idea, I don't use firefox
